heading: Today
text: Early snow showers giving way to increasing sun. Brisk and cold.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Becoming clear, some clouds north and west late.
temperature: Single numbers to low teens, 0 to 5 below northeast

heading: Saturday
text: Breezy. Chance of a flurry or sprnikle far north.
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s north,  mid to upper 40s south
